 Addition to both sides of 'less than'.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement: ltadd2 $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> ( A < B <-> ( C + A ) < ( C + B ) ) ) $.
